sentences.sContent: A wasp stung me on the arm.
sentences.sContent_eng: A wasp stung me on the arm.

sentences.sContent: Years of dealing with plasters and wasp stings on the beach mean handbags and subsequently backpacks are stuffed with remedies.
sentences.sContent_eng: Years of dealing with plasters and wasp stings on the beach mean handbags and subsequently backpacks are stuffed with remedies.
sentences.sCn: 和药膏和沙滩上黄蜂叮咬打了多年交道，结果是我的手提包和背包里塞满了药物。

words.tran: 尖刻的；易怒的；如黄蜂的；腰细的

trans.tranCn: 黄蜂；[昆] 胡蜂；易怒的人
trans.tranOther: a thin black and yellow flying insect that can sting you
